actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to include any veterans' or survivors' compensation or pension in the determination of the yearly income disregard for purposes of the supplemental security income program.
short_title: Equal Treatment of VA Payments Act of 2001

summary.text: Equal Treatment of VA Payments Act of 2001 - Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) (SSI) of the Social Security Act to include any veterans' or survivors' compensation or pension in the determination of the yearly income disregard for purposes of the SSI program.

titles.title: Equal Treatment of VA Payments Act of 2001

A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to include any veterans' or survivors' compensation or pension in the determination of the yearly income disregard for purposes of the supplemental security income program.
